page.title: 16SCHOOL 2 THE DEPUTY HEAD
page.content: opment of new areas like Crown Wood,Bi irch Hill,Home Farm & Hanworth.GtHoll ands has improved beyond recognition & is much less rough.I hope the school h as helped"{Teaching a good career?}"If you want lots of money&a good time,no, but it is the best job if you like wo rking with young people.I didnt expect fame or wealth but I wanted to feel I had helped the younger generation.It t ook abt.10 years to fully accept it" {Uniform?}"I have taught in many places & am generally for it because children can be made v.unhappy competing to be fashionable & parents pressurized to buy clothes they can't afford.Uniform helps parents&pupils"{Teaching in a {new town?}"It is completely different to the boarding schools where I have s pent most of my career.The kids are mo re natural&less inhibited"{Contacts wi {other schools?}Like any other business
